info.name: Move files
info.description:
Required variables in Postman environment
PID - project node_id
PID2 - project node_id
provider - provider name to test e.g. dropbox
alt_provider - provider name for inter provider testing
basicauth - Basic Auth Token
protocol - i.e. http:
host - e.g. //localhost
port - e.g. :7777

provider and alt_provider must be setup in both PID and PID2 with the same root folder

In addition to extensive file moving, this collection will test...

Creating directories
Uploading small files
Upload relpacing small files
Deleting files
Deleting directories - with contents
Getting metadata

item.name: 11. Move file1 to folder2 rename new/replace/keep
move file1 to folder2 rename replace
move file1 to folder2 rename keep
12. Move file1 to PID2 folder2 new/replace/keep
move file1 to PID2 folder2 replace
move file1 to PID2 folder2 keep
13. Move file1 to PID2 folder2 rename new/replace/keep
move file1 to PID2 folder2 rename
move file1 to PID2 folder2 replace rename
move file1 to PID2 folder2 keep rename
14. Move file1 to alt_provider folder2 new/replace/keep
move file1 to alt_provider folder2 replace
move file1 to alt_provider folder2 keep
15. Move file1 to alt_provider folder2 rename new/replace/keep
move file1 to alt_provider folder2 rename
move file1 to alt_provider folder2 replace rename
move file1 to alt_provider folder2 keep rename
16. Move file1 from alt_provider folder1 new/replace/keep
upload file1 to folder1 alt_provider (new content)
move alt_provider file1 to folder2 replace
upload file1 to folder1 alt_provider (newer content)
move file1 to alt_provider folder2 keep
17. Move file1 from alt_provider folder1 rename new/replace/keep
move alt_provider file1 to folder2 rename
upload file1 to folder1 alt_provider (new content)
move alt_provider file1 to folder2 replace rename
upload file1 to folder1 alt_provider (newer content)
move file1 to alt_provider folder2 keep rename
18. Move file1 to PID2 alt_provider folder2 new/replace/keep
move file1 to PID2 alt_provider folder2
move file1 to PID2 alt_provider folder2 replace
move file1 to PID2 alt_provider folder2 keep
19. Move file1 to PID2 alt_provider folder2 rename new/replace/keep
copy file1 to PID2 alt_provider folder2 rename
upload file1 to folder1 copy (new content)
copy file1 to PID2 alt_provider folder2 replace rename
copy file1 to PID2 alt_provider folder2 keep rename
20. Move file1 from PID2 alt_provider folder1 new/replace/keep
upload file1 to folder1 PID2 alt_provider
move PID2 alt_provider file1 to folder2
upload file1 to folder1 PID2 alt_provider (new content)
move PID2 alt_provider file1 to folder2 replace
upload file1 to folder1 PID2 alt_provider (newer content)
move PID2 alt_provider file1 to folder2 keep
21. Move file1 from PID2 alt_provider folder1 rename new/replace/keep
upload file1 to folder1 PID2 alt_provider
move PID2 alt_provider file1 to folder2 rename
upload file1 to folder1 PID2 alt_provider (new content)
move PID2 alt_provider file1 to folder2 rename replace
upload file1 to folder1 PID2 alt_provider (newer content)
move PID2 alt_provider file1 to folder2 rename keep
